room_title: Escape room "The Medieval Adventure" by Can You Escape? in Tampa
review: Excellent! Jenny did a terrific job getting us settled in the "Medieval Room" and making it a very enjoyable experience! It was a blast and we will definitely be back!  The teens wanted to take on another room after! I kind of did too! Great family fun.

room_title: Escape room "The Medieval Adventure" by Can You Escape? in Tampa
review: I have been there a total of 3 times and have tried 3 different rooms. All of them were totally engrossing, exciting and lots of fun! My favorite one so far is the medieval room. Office had too much math for me and London was hard!!' Haha. First timers should start with medieval! Enjoy guys!

room_title: Escape room "The Medieval Adventure" by Can You Escape? in Tampa
review: We did the Medieval room tonight and had such an incredible time! We got out with 3 minutes remaining. Great team building exercise and lots of laughs. The staff Adriana and Ian were very helpful and knew just when to offer us some clues. We canâ€™t wait to go again!

room_title: Escape room "The Medieval Adventure" by Can You Escape? in Tampa
review: The Medieval experience is challenging and so much fun. The staff were super friendly. I recommend Can you Escape? for a small or large group. I will be back to visit London or the Zombie (if my daughter can talk me into it). :)
